verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
This is holy ground.
We're standing on holy ground.
For the Lord is present, and where He is, is holy.
- Repeat-
These are holy lips. We're singing through holy lips.
For the Lord is singing
Through these and they are holy.
- Repeat -–
These are holy hands. We're lifting up holy hands.
For the Lord is working
Through these and they are holy.
Repeat –
